financial_health_scorecard.methodology: Institutional CFA-level financial analysis with A-F grading system

profit_margin.grade_rationale: Above peer average profit margins indicate operational efficiency

roe_quality.assessment: Exceptionally high ROE but requires decomposition analysis

dupont_analysis.roe_driver: High financial leverage driving ROE - requires monitoring

asset_quality.asset_composition: Long-term power generation assets dominate balance sheet

asset_utilization.assessment: Low asset turnover expected for capital-intensive utility operations
